show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
Are defective genes waiting time bombs? How selective is our hearing as we age? Is having too few intestinal microbes qualify as a disease?
Can better pain management shorten hospital stays?
What simple, non-invasive, affordable test measures the amount of arteriosclerosis in our arteries?
Vicki’s 20-20 tips: Homemade mosquito repellent  A safe landing…
